summary:
[u]REQUIRES DRAGONBORN[/u]
A spider than can fight and carry all your gear.
descriptionHtml:
This spider is not only a spider follower, he can also carry up to 300 pounds of items. This mods a spider follower to Tel Mithryn tower name Pack Spider. He can be hired and rehired due to modified follower script. He is also powerful in combat. If you would like a second spider follower I had made one only for combat.
Other Spider Mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33004
[u]REQUIRES DRAGONBORN[/u]

[size=5]Pack Spider[/size]

[u]Stats:[/u]
Speed=150(Normal Spider)
Level min of 50 and max 100
Leveled with player x1
Base Attack:36
30 Base Health
30 Base Stamina
30 Base Magicka
Is essential
Doesn't effect stealth meter
Carry Weight:300
Class=Frostbite Spider

[u]Skill(min)(Leveled with player):[/u]
100 One-handed
15 Two-handed
100 Archery
100 Block
15 Smithing
15 Heavy armour
15 Light armour
15 Pickpocket
15 Lockpicking
100 Sneak
15 Alteration
15 Speech
15 illusion
15 Alteration
15 Conjuration
15 Enchanting
15 Restoration
15 Destruction

[u]AI Data:[/u]
Unaggressive
Happy
Foolhardy
Helps Friends and Allies
50 Energy

I hope you enjoy and please endorse and comment! :)
author: The Mad Meister
